law.catch_line: Employee Eligibility For Group Insurance Programs And Benefits
law.text: [Text of section effective until July 1 preceding the opening of the Essex North Shore agricultural and technical school. Repealed by 2004, 463, Sec. 1. See 2004, 463, Sec. 18 as amended by 2010, 130, Sec. 7.] Employees of a school under this chapter shall be eligible to participate in all group insurance programs and benefits administered by the group insurance commission pursuant to the provisions of section 16 of chapter 34B.
